name: Accordion
author: Daniel Buchner
description: An accordion is a collection of panels containing content separated by toggler elements.

attributes.selected-index: Gets/sets the current section that is opened. This overrides any headers that are marked as selected.

events.seleted: Fires each time an item is selected.

methods.setSelected: Sets the selected header element by passing a header element.

setters.selectedIndex: Sets the current header by index and updates the selected-index attribute.
